basics.name: Owen Walpole
basics.label: CompTIA Secure Infrastructure Specialist
basics.summary: I am currently employed as a TSG Technician at UPS.

work.summary: Provide customer focused support to resolve technology related problems within UPS.
highlights: Install, configure, and deploy computers, printers, scan guns, and more.
Manage tickets, asset records, and contacts using ServiceNow.
Manage asset life cycle and security best practices.
Handle equipment repair and refurbishment cases both internally and externally with vendors.
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone.
Manage tickets, monitor assets, and remotely access devices using Connectwise products.
Manage licensing and core functionality of the Microsoft Office 365 suite.
Maintain and migrate web and email servers in the Microsoft Azure cloud.
